detaileddescription.para: Software control only
HWI0/HWO0 control path can override the software configuration
HWI1/HWO1 control path can override the software configuration
Defines direct hardware control characteristics of the pin . Use type XMC_GPIO_HWCTRL_t for this enum.
No internal pull device active
Internal pull-down device active
Internal pull-up device active
No internal pull device active;Pn_OUTx continuously samples the input value
Inverted no internal pull device active
Inverted internal pull-down device active
Inverted internal pull-up device active
Inverted no internal pull device active; Pn_OUTx continuously samples the input value
Push-pull general-purpose output
Open-drain general-purpose output
Push-pull alternate output function 1
Push-pull alternate output function 2
Push-pull alternate output function 3
Push-pull alternate output function 4
Open drain alternate output function 1
Open drain alternate output function 2
Open drain alternate output function 3
Open drain alternate output function 4

Defines the direction and characteristics of a pin. Use type XMC_GPIO_MODE_t for this enum. For the operation with alternate functions, the port pins are directly connected to input or output functions of the on-chip periphery.
Reset bit
Set bit
Defines output level of a pin. Use type XMC_GPIO_OUTPUT_LEVEL_t for this enum.
Defines pad driver mode, for high speed 3.3V LVTTL outputs
Defines pad driver mode, for high speed 3.3V LVTTL outputs
Defines pad driver mode, medium speed 3.3V LVTTL outputs
Defines pad driver mode, medium speed 3.3V LVTTL outputs
Defines pad driver mode, for low speed 3.3V LVTTL outputs
Defines pad driver mode, low speed 3.3V LVTTL outputs
Defines output strength and slew rate of a pin. Use type XMC_GPIO_OUTPUT_STRENGTH_t for this enum.

parameterdescription.para: constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access hardware register Pn_PDISC.
port pin number.

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disable digital input path for analog pins and configures Pn_PDISC register.This configuration is applicable only for analog port pins.

parameterdescription.para: constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access hardware register Pn_PPS.
port pin number.

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables pin power save mode and configures Pn_PPS register.This configuration is useful when the controller enters Deep Sleep mode. This configuration enables input Schmitt-Trigger and output driver stage(if pin is enabled power save mode previously). By default port pin does not react to power save mode request.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Do not enable the Pin Power Save function for pins configured for Hardware Control (Pn_HWSEL.HWx != 00B). Doing so may result in an undefined behavior of the pin when the device enters the Deep Sleep state.

parameterdescription.para: constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access hardware register Pn_PDISC.
port pin number.

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enable digital input path for analog pins and configures Pn_PDISC register.This configuration is applicable only for analog port pins.

detaileddescription.para:
port
constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access hardware register Pn_PPS.
pin
port pin number.
None
Description:
Enables pin power save mode and configures Pn_PPS register.This configuration is useful when the controller enters Deep Sleep mode.Port pin enabled with power save mode option are set to a defined state and the input Schmitt-Trigger as well as the output driver stage are switched off. By default port pin does not react to power save mode request.
Related APIs:
XMC_GPIO_DisablePowerSaveMode()
Note: Do not enable the Pin Power Save function for pins configured for Hardware Control (Pn_HWSEL.HWx != 00B). Doing so may result in an undefined behavior of the pin when the device enters the Deep Sleep state.

parameterdescription.para: constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access hardware register Pn_IN.
Port pin number.

simplesect.para: uint32_t pin logic level status.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Reads the Pn_IN register and returns the current logical value at the GPIO pin.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Prior to this api, user has to configure port pin to input mode using XMC_GPIO_SetMode().

memberdef.argsstring: (XMC_GPIO_PORT_t *const port, const uint8_t pin, const XMC_GPIO_CONFIG_t *const config)
memberdef.name: XMC_GPIO_Init

parameterdescription.para: Constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access port registers like Pn_OUT,Pn_OMR,Pn_IOCR etc.
Port pin number.
GPIO configuration data structure. Refer data structure XMC_GPIO_CONFIG_t for details.

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Initializes input / output mode settings like, pull up / pull down devices,push pull /open drain, and pad driver mode. Also configures alternate function outputs and clears hardware port control for selected port and pin . It configures hardware registers Pn_IOCR,Pn_OUT,Pn_OMR,Pn_PDISC and Pn_PDR.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: This API is called in definition of DAVE_init by code generation and therefore should not be explicitly called for the normal operation. Use other APIs only after DAVE_init is called successfully (returns DAVE_STATUS_SUCCESS).

memberdef.argsstring: (XMC_GPIO_PORT_t *const port, const uint8_t pin, const XMC_GPIO_HWCTRL_t hwctrl)
memberdef.name: XMC_GPIO_SetHardwareControl

parameterdescription.para: constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access hardware register Pn_HWSEL.
port pin number.
direct hardware control selection. Refer XMC_GPIO_HWCTRL_t for valid values.

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Selects direct hard ware control and configures Pn_HWSEL register.This configuration is useful for the port pins overlaid with peripheral functions for which the connected peripheral needs hardware control.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Do not enable the Pin Power Save function for pins configured for Hardware Control (Pn_HWSEL.HWx != 00B). Doing so may result in an undefined behavior of the pin when the device enters the Deep Sleep state.

memberdef.argsstring: (XMC_GPIO_PORT_t *const port, const uint8_t pin, const XMC_GPIO_MODE_t mode)
memberdef.name: XMC_GPIO_SetMode

parameterdescription.para: Constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access hardware register Pn_IOCR.
Port pin number.
input / output functionality selection. Refer XMC_GPIO_MODE_t for valid values.

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Sets digital input and output driver functionality and characteristics of a GPIO port pin. It configures hardware registers Pn_IOCR. mode is initially configured during initialization in XMC_GPIO_Init(). Call this API to alter the port direction functionality as needed later in the program.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access hardware register Pn_OMR.
Port pin number.

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Sets port pin output to high. It configures hardware registers Pn_OMR.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Prior to this api, user has to configure port pin to output mode using XMC_GPIO_SetMode(). Register Pn_OMR is virtual and does not contain any flip-flop. A read action delivers the value of 0.

memberdef.argsstring: (XMC_GPIO_PORT_t *const port, const uint8_t pin, const XMC_GPIO_OUTPUT_LEVEL_t level)
memberdef.name: XMC_GPIO_SetOutputLevel

parameterdescription.para: Constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access hardware register Pn_OMR.
Port pin number.
output level selection. Refer XMC_GPIO_OUTPUT_LEVEL_t for valid values.

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Set port pin output level to high or low.It configures hardware registers Pn_OMR.level is initially configured during initialization in XMC_GPIO_Init(). Call this API to alter output level as needed later in the program.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_GPIO_SetOutputHigh(), XMC_GPIO_SetOutputLow().

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Prior to this api, user has to configure port pin to output mode using XMC_GPIO_SetMode().

parameterdescription.para: constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access hardware register Pn_OMR.
port pin number.

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Sets port pin output to low. It configures hardware registers Pn_OMR.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Prior to this api, user has to configure port pin to output mode using XMC_GPIO_SetMode(). Register Pn_OMR is virtual and does not contain any flip-flop. A read action delivers the value of 0.

memberdef.argsstring: (XMC_GPIO_PORT_t *const port, const uint8_t pin, XMC_GPIO_OUTPUT_STRENGTH_t strength)

parameterdescription.para: constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access hardware register Pn_PDR.
Port pin number.
Output driver mode selection. Refer data structure XMC_GPIO_OUTPUT_STRENGTH_t for details.

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Sets port pin output strength and slew rate. It configures hardware registers Pn_PDR. strength is initially configured during initialization in XMC_GPIO_Init(). Call this API to alter output driver mode as needed later in the program.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Prior to this api, user has to configure port pin to output mode using XMC_GPIO_SetMode().

port pin number.

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Note:

briefdescription.para: General Purpose Input Output (GPIO) driver for the XMC microcontroller family.

detaileddescription.para: GPIO driver provide a generic and very flexible software interface for all standard digital I/O port pins. Each port slice has individual interfaces for the operation as General Purpose I/O and it further provides the connectivity to the on-chip periphery and the control for the pad characteristics.
The driver is divided into Input and Output mode.

Input mode features:
Configuration structure XMC_GPIO_CONFIG_t and initialization function XMC_GPIO_Init()
Allows the selection of weak pull-up or pull-down device. Configuration structure XMC_GPIO_MODE_t and function XMC_GPIO_SetMode()

Output mode features:
Allows the selection of push pull/open drain and Alternate output. Configuration structure XMC_GPIO_MODE_t and function XMC_GPIO_SetMode()
Allows the selection of pad driver strength. Configuration structure XMC_GPIO_OUTPUT_STRENGTH_t and function XMC_GPIO_SetOutputStrength()
Allows the selection of initial output level. Configuration structure XMC_GPIO_OUTPUT_LEVEL_t and function XMC_GPIO_SetOutputLevel()
